participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Jake enjoys connecting with people and sharing stories.
participant_1.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i have never been out of ohio. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, Emily loves teaching music and helping others through her volunteer work.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
